<<<<<<< HEAD
Pelagius redivivus. Or Pelagius raked out of the ashes by Arminius and his schollers Parallelismus nov-antiqui erroris Pelagiarminiani. English Featley, Daniel, 1582-1645.
[28] p.
Printed for Robert Mylbourne, London : 1626.
By Daniel Featley. A reissue, with cancel title page, of "A parallel: of new-old Pelagiarminian error", a translation of: Parallelismus nov-antiqui erroris Pelagiarminiani. Directed at Richard Montagu. Signatures: A-C⁴ D² . Four pages are paginated. Running title reads: A parallell. Variant: title has "racked". Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
Pelagius redivivus. Or Pelagius raked out of the ashes by Arminius and his schollers Parallelismus nov-antiqui erroris Pelagiarminiani. English Featley, Daniel, 1582-1645.
[28] p.
Printed for Robert Mylbourne, London : 1626.
By Daniel Featley. A reissue, with cancel title page, of "A parallel: of new-old Pelagiarminian error", a translation of: Parallelismus nov-antiqui erroris Pelagiarminiani. Directed at Richard Montagu. Signatures: A-C⁴ D² . Four pages are paginated. Running title reads: A parallell. Variant: title has "racked". Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
Robert Mylbourne
